.hw   cha
wc   2
df   type of *plant-camellia sinensis, *tea
zb   *tea plant
.hw   cha'- < >
df   *better not, *don't, *should not--with possessive pronouns
al   chacha'
il   Cha'-mu ume'essitan. |You'd better not joke

  me

df   *slightly, *hardly; same as prefix %chat-|, but may modify whole
  phrases
il   Chat ha hasso si Juan enao. |Juan hardly ever thinks of that

df   *slightly (prefix), *hardly, *barely
al   chatta'
il   Chatbunita. |Slightly pretty
il   Chatmalagu si Juan. |John is not a good runner
il   Chatespiha hao nu guahu. |You hardly searched for me

  listed below

df   *tiny, *small, minute, relatively little
cf   chibe', dikike', po'yet
.hw   dichosu

df   *faithful, loyal, devoted, dedicated, blessed, *divine
cf   dibotu
.hw   dichu
df   the *very, the *said
al   dicha
il   Gi dichu ora anai makama yo' estaba hao gi gipot. |The very hour
  when I was bed-ridden, you were at the party
il   Pues dichu enao na tiempo. |At that very time
.hw   d/idide'
wc   2

.hw   /entalo'
wc   2
df   *between, *among, *middle
il   Entalo' i lepblo. |The middle of the book
il   Tumohtohge yo' gi entalo' i dos tronkon hayu. |I am standing
  between the two trees
.hw   /entalo'
wc   2
df   *meddle
il   Gof ya-$na umentalo' gi areklon dos umasagua. |He likes to meddle
  in the affairs of the two married people
.hw   entalu'i
wc   1
df   *interfere, *meddle, interrupt, minding another's business
il   Munga na un entalu'i i patgon gi huegu-$na. |Don't interfere with
  the child in his game
.hw   enteru
wc   2
df   *solid, not hollow; *entire, all of
.hw   entieru
wc   2

al   enteru
cf   todu, puru
.hw   entinadu
wc   2
df   *stepson; entinada (f)
.hw   entonses
df   *then, *so, *well then
cf   pues
il   Entonses na munga hao. |Then, you don't want it
.hw   entonses na
df   mean to say, one's *intention, one's wish, what is being expected
il   Entonses na munga hao humanao. |You mean to say that you aren't
  going
il   Entonses na para un tattiyi yo'. |So you are going to follow me
.hw   entot
df   *piece of
.hw   entrada
wc   2
df   *entrance, entry, gateway, passageway

il   Hu fa'bentana i petta. |I changed the door into a window

.hw   fa'chada'

df   *flatter, laud someone in order to obtain a favor; make a fool of
  someone
cf   fa'ande'
il   Fa'chada' si Jose ya un nina'i ni kareta. |Flatter Jose so that
  he will give you the car
.hw   fa'chalani
wc   1
df   make a *path
cf   miche'
.hw   fache' < >
wc   2
df   *mud, *dirt, *loam, *mire, *slime, *bog, excess of liquid in a
  mixture, *puddle

  aid

il   Facho'cho' gi lancho agupa'. |Work at the farm tomorrow
.hw   fa'dagi < >
wc   1
df   *belie, create false impression, to use as excuse
il   Hu fa'dagi i amigu-hu potno hu hanao gi gipot. |I used my friend
  as an excuse for not going to the party
il   Si Paul ha fa'dagi si tata-$na nigap. |Paul used his father as an
  excuse yesterday

  |The Japanese race propagates in Hawaii because they have lots of
  children
.hw   fan < >
df   *please, *polite particle
il   Maila' fan. |Please come
il   Fatto agupa' fan. |Please come tomorrow
il   Huchom fan i petta. |Please close the door. Also used
  figuratively in sense of daring someone|
il   Maila' fan. |I dare you to come
.hw   fan- < >
df   imperative marker prefix, future indefinite object marker, plural
  subject marker
cf   man-
il   I famagu'on para u fanpiknik giya Tatgua. |The children are going
  for a picnic at Tatgua
il   Fanhanao!| Go!
.hw   fan...an < >
df   *place where--affixes which name a place devoted to some
  particular place where something exists; suffix %-an |occurs as
  %-yan |following vowels
il   Suni |'taro'
il   Fansuniyan |'taro patch'
il   O'mak |'bathe'
il   Fano'makan |'bath tub, shower room'
il   Fa'i |'growing rice'
il   Fanfa'iyan |'rice field'

.hw   fueges
wc   1
df   *beat up, *overpower, *punish, *hurt, *harm, *injure
cf   a$na
.hw   fuera
wc   2
df   *without, *excluding, *except, *minus
cf   sin
il   Todu Si$na manhanao fuera si David. |Everyone can go except David
il   Si$na hao humanao lao fuera gue'. |You can go but not him
.hw   fuera di
df   *besides, *outside of, *aside from, except for
il   Bula na taotao siha lumi'e' Hawaii fuera di hagu. |There are lots
  of people who have seen Hawaii besides you
il   Fuera di Guam, Saipan mas dankolo na isla giya Marianas. |Except
  for Guam, Saipan is the largest island in the Marianas
.hw   fuera sin buenas
wc   2
df   *eleven points--in card game (tres siete)
.hw   fuetsa
wc   2
df   *energy, *power, *strength, *force, *might
cf   alimento, alentos, minetgot
.hw   fuets/ao
wc   2
df   *required, *obligatory
al   afuetsao
.hw   fuetsudu
wc   2
df   *muscular, having well-developed muscles (m)
al   fuetsuda |(f)
.hw   fueyes
wc   2
df   *forge, furnace where metal is heated for shaping
.hw   fugo'
wc   1
df   *wring, *squeeze
.hw   fugu
wc   2
df   *cold, *chilly, *freezing, *icy, *frigid
cf   manengheng
.hw   fuhot
wc   1
df   *bind--lightly, put a slender hoop around a barrel
.hw   fulanu
wc   2
df   *someone, Mr; so and So (m)
al   fulana |(f). Used for an imaginary person, such as John Doe
il   Si fulanu sumangan na ginen mapresu hao. |Mr. So and So said that
  you were in prison before
.hw   fulo'
wc   1
df   *wrestle
cf   umafulo'
.hw   fulot
wc   2
df   sensation or taste on tongue from eating unripe banana, tingling
  sensation from eating certain things
.hw   funai
wc   2
df   type of *fish-lutjanus kasmira (family lutjanidae); snappers
zb   *snapper
.hw   funas
wc   1
df   *eradicate, *erase, *rub out, *wipe out, put an end to, clear (of
  sin)
.hw   funda
wc   2
df   *covering, case
.hw   fundan alunan
wc   2
df   *pillow case
.hw   fundan katre
wc   2
df   *sheet, bed sheet
.hw   funhayan
wc   2
df   *complete, *finish, be done with it
il   Funhayan gumimen pues ta hanao. |Finish drinking, then we will go
.hw   fun/ografu
wc   2
df   *phonograph, *record player, music
cf   musiku, dandan
.hw   funot
wc   1
df   *tighten up
cf   fu$not
.hw   fu$not
wc   1
df   *tighten up--as a bundle, *squeeze, *bind
il   Hu fu$not i manohon siboyas. |I tightened up the bundle of onions
il   Ma fu$not yo' gi halom kareta. |They squeezed me inside the car
.hw   fusi$nos
wc   2
df   *hoe--long handled with straight blade, used for weeding or
  clearing tall grass
cf   guassa
.hw   fuso'
wc   1
df   remove nut or coconut meat from shell
.hw   futot
wc   1
df   *block (pathway), *barricade, set up *roadblock
.hw   fuyot
wc   1
df   *sandwich in, *wrap up, *infold, cover by winding around or
  folding, roll up
al   afuyot
cf   balutan, falulon
il   Hu fuyot i guihan ni titiyas. |I wrapped the fish with the
  tortilla
